name: Automagik Forge v0.5.1-rc.1
body:
## ‚ú® What's New

### Genie Widgets System
- **Wish (Planner)**: AI-powered task planning and specification refinement
- **Forge (Executor)**: Automated code generation and build execution
- **Review (Validator)**: QA automation and code review assistance
- Integrated Genie chat widgets directly into Kanban columns
- Master Genie orchestration for complex workflows

### Omni Integration
- WhatsApp messaging integration for notifications
- Configure Omni instances for task updates
- Real-time messaging capabilities

### UI/UX Improvements
- Custom Release Notes dialog with local data (no GitHub API rate limits)
- Enhanced Kanban board with widget integration
- Improved task status mapping and filtering
- Custom breadcrumb navigation
- Footer with version information

### Developer Experience
- Restored pt-BR localization
- Advanced MCP tools integration (58 tools total)
- Custom API utilities for Forge-specific operations
- Improved type safety with shared forge-types

## üîß Technical Details

- Upgraded from upstream v0.0.110 to v0.0.113
- Fixed ICU thread safety issues
- Optimized frontend build configuration
- Enhanced backend MCP server capabilities

## üì¶ Installation

Refer to the main README for installation instructions.

## üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed frontend asset embedding path
- Resolved TypeScript compilation errors
- Fixed task status type compatibility

---

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/namastexlabs/automagik-forge/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1-rc.1
